faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How do I apply for a professional license in the UAE?
items.answer: You can apply for a professional license in Dubai, UAE, through the appropriate regulatory bodies, such as the DED or Free Zone authorities. Our experts simplify the licensing process by handling the paperwork and government back-and-forth.

items.question: How long does it take to get a professional license in Dubai?
items.answer: Our experts take 3-5 working days, depending on document readiness, your location, and legal structure.

items.question: Can I hire employees with a professional license?
items.answer: Yes, you can sponsor visas for employees and dependents once your license and establishment card are active.

items.question: Can I operate across the UAE with a professional license?
items.answer: Yes, a mainland-issued professional license allows you to serve clients worldwide.

items.question: What’s the difference between a professional and commercial license?
items.answer: A professional license is for service-based activities, whereas a commercial license for trading physical goods and products.
